attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban smoking in/near bus stops so that others walking or cycling past bus stops will not breath in the dreadful smoke of the people waylaidly smoking in/near the bus stops. Also, it looks very bad to tourists and visitors to other countries for them to see our fellow citezens stubbing out a ciggarette before getting on the bus. They smell of smoke on the bus, and it is not very nice for other bus passengers to have to smell it.
